TypeSignature.Value: public interface IFileAttribute : Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, IDisposable, Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable
.class public interface auto ansi abstract IFileAttribute implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, class System.IDisposable
type IFileAttribute = interface interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable

Docs.summary: An object that encapsulates the value of a file attribute that can be set atomically when creating a new file or directory by invoking the java.nio.file.Files#createFile createFile or java.nio.file.Files#createDirectory createDirectory methods.
